name: EC Group International
tag_list: software, software-development, engineering, programming, isv, offshore, off-shore, outsourcing, offshoring, staff-augmentation, agile, scrum, build-operate-transfer, offshore-teams
overview:
EC Group provides a simple, yet powerful service that enables software companies to reap the benefits of offshore software development while significantly lowering the risks by allowing the client to stay in control.

We recruit and hire skilled personnel to work under your direction to help you develop, maintain, manage, and support your applications. Your team works out of our development center located in Chennai, India. The team is fully dedicated to your projects as if they were your own employees in a regional office.

It’s your team … in our office … in India. It’s that simple.

You don’t have to be a large company to build a global software team; we provide uncomplicated and very affordable services for companies of any size.

As an extension of your internal team, EC Group provides higher productivity, lower costs, and shorter delivery times than other offshore models, providing value and success on an accelerated basis.
